title: Stop the Sarcasm!
itunes:author: Guests: Matt & Lisa Jacobson
itunes:summary:
Telling jokes can be a great way to liven up your marriage. But, a good punch line should never come at your spouse's expense. Greg, Erin and John explain why sarcasm can be toxic for your marriage. Featuring Matt and Lisa Jacobson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get our "100 Ways to Love" book bundle for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-07-01?refcd=1132501

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/stop-the-sarcasm/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
